rdf:Description.dc:title: Job search information service guide 1983
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Hire-A-Student Resource Section.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Prepared by Alberta Manpower, Hire-A-Student Resource Section in consultation with Alberta Hire-A-Student committees and selected educational personnel and employers throughout the province".
Issued in 2 parts: guide no. 1. Preparation for presentations -- guide no. 2. Presentation content.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Applications for positions
